appetizers.title: Loaded Nachos
appetizers.description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, black beans, sour cream, and pico de gallo.

appetizers.title: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Crispy fried mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce for dipping.

appetizers.title: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
appetizers.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip served with tortilla chips or warm bread.

appetizers.title: Beer-Battered Onion Rings
appetizers.description: Thick-cut onion rings coated in a beer batter, served with a zesty dipping sauce.

appetizers.title: Sweet Potato Fries
appetizers.description: Crispy sweet potato fries served with a side of chipotle aioli.

appetizers.title: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Toasted baguette slices topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

entrees.title: Grilled Steak Tacos
entrees.description: Marinated grilled steak topped with salsa, guacamole, and shredded cheese in soft tortillas.

entrees.title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
entrees.description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce, served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

entrees.title: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
entrees.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork in smoky barbecue sauce, piled high on a toasted bun with coleslaw.

entrees.title: Black Bean Burger
entrees.description: A flavorful black bean patty topped with lettuce, tomato, and chipotle mayo, served on a whole-grain bun.

entrees.title: Bacon and Blue Cheese Burger
entrees.description: Char-grilled beef patty topped with crispy bacon, blue cheese crumbles, lettuce, and tomato.

entrees.title: Turkey Avocado Club Wrap
entrees.description: Turkey, bacon, avocado, lettuce, and tomato wrapped in a flour tortilla.

entrees.title: BBQ Brisket Sliders
entrees.description: Mini sliders with slow-smoked BBQ brisket, pickles, and tangy barbecue sauce.

entrees.title: Quinoa Burger
entrees.description: A hearty quinoa and vegetable patty topped with lettuce, tomato, and a zesty aioli.

entrees.title: Pasta Primavera
entrees.description: Fresh vegetables sautéed with garlic and tossed with pasta in a light marinara sauce.

entrees.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
entrees.description: Grilled chicken breast, romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

entrees.title: Tomato Basil Pizza
entrees.description: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

entrees.title: Mushroom and Swiss Veggie Melt
entrees.description: Grilled portobello mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese on a ciabatta roll with roasted red peppers and basil pesto.

desserts.title: Chocolate Stout Brownie Sundae
desserts.description: Rich chocolate stout brownie topped with vanilla ice cream, chocolate sauce, and whipped cream.

desserts.title: Key Lime Pie Bites
desserts.description: Miniature key lime pies served with a dollop of whipped cream.

desserts.title: Apple Cinnamon Scones
desserts.description: Flaky empanadas filled with spiced apple and cinnamon, served warm with vanilla ice cream.

desserts.title: Peanut Butter Pretzel Milkshake
desserts.description: A creamy milkshake blended with peanut butter, chocolate, and crushed pretzels.

desserts.title: Red Velvet Cake
desserts.description: Moist red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting.

desserts.title: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

drinks.title: Craft Beer Sampler Platter
drinks.description: A selection of local and craft beers for a tasting experience.

drinks.title: Mango Habanero Margarita
drinks.description: A spicy twist on the classic margarita with fresh mango and habanero-infused tequila.

drinks.title: Tropical Punch
drinks.description: A fruity and refreshing punch with a mix of tropical juices and a splash of soda.

drinks.title: Iced Caramel Espresso Martini
drinks.description: A chilled espresso martini with a hint of caramel and served over ice.

drinks.title: Classic Mojito
drinks.description: Fresh mint, lime, and simple syrup muddled with white rum and topped with soda.

drinks.title: Berry Blast Smoothie
drinks.description: Mixed berries blended with yogurt and a touch of honey.
